nodes.text: The Saxan Chemical Refinery was a factory located in the Biochemical Industrial District of Coronet City's Labor Valley on Corellia. During the Battle of Corellia, Sith forces under Lord Argos were sent to the factory by the Dark Jedi Tol Braga to construct a chemical bomb, but Jedi forces under the Hero of Tython were able to stop the Sith before the bomb could be completed.
